name: Project Genom
summary:
An ambitious MMO game in steam Early Access. It is planed to be Buy-to-Play through Early Access and on full release.

"Sci-fi mmorpg Project Genom will let you participate in the battle for the survival of humankind. Having destroyed their own planet, humans have found a new home and a seemingly happy life on Avalon. But people are not the only ones who liked the place. What attracted to this planet the mysterious almer? More evolved, more powerful, and united, they destroyed human forces wherever they clashed. It seemed there was no hope left, but the tides of time bring new heroes, and you have a chance to become one! Defend your race and stand up for what you believe in, feel the new power that humanity will come to possess with Project Genom."
